text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump I'm sorry. Is this the same Kayleigh McEnany, who, just six weeks ago, said that "we will not see diseases like the coronavirus come here"? Because if it is, your word is worth less than the spittle that comes out of your mouth when you lie.
